articles.title: James Bond writer Ian Fleming's damning Sean Connery snub: 'F*** up my work!' - Express
articles.description: JAMES BOND creator Ian Fleming revealed his fury ahead of Sean Connery's first 007 film and accused the production of trying to 'f*** up my work'.
